Project Project

This is a Reed College summer research Project dedicated to Projecting mathematical ideas into the visual realm. The team consists of Henry Blanchette, Cameron Fish, Chris Henn, Kyle Ormsby, Lana Tollas, and Jalan Ziyad. We’ll be posting here about what we make, how we make it, and the math underlying all of it.

Topics

Multivariable Calculus
Iterated Integrals
Lana Tollas
Green’s Theorem
Cameron Fish
Level Sets and Gradient Flow
Henry Blanchette
2D Vector Fields and Their Derivative
Chris Henn
3D Printing
Stereographic Projection

About 3D Modeling and Printing

Milnor Fibrations
Henry Blanchette
Constant Width
Fabrication of Bodies of Constant Width
